DOC.brief_summary: The goal study compare first pas success rate intubation video assist intubation traditional direct visualization intubation field Emergency Medical Service ( EMS ) professional
DOC.brief_title: King Video Laryngoscope Versus Direct Laryngoscopy Prehospital Intubation : A Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: We equip several local advance life support ambulance low cost video laryngoscope total 12 month . We outfit ½ ambulance crew King Video Laryngoscope ( KVL ) 6 month ½ ambulance use traditional direct laryngoscopy ( DL ) . After 6 month , group switch device . We randomly assign ambulance first use KVL . After one year ( 12 month ) compare outcomes two method include first pas intubation success , total success rate intubation , complication ( need surgical airway , rescue device , need revert KVL DL , etc. ) . Please see attach protocol page additional detail .
DOC.criteria: patient > = age 18 year age undergoing ETI prehospital set age < 18 year age
DOC.keyword: intubation , video laryngoscopy , direct laryngoscopy , prehospital , emergency medical service
